title: Relativistic Stationary Schrodinger Equation for Many Particle System and Its Applications
abstract: Basing on the fundamental symmetry that the space-time inversion is equivalent to particle-antiparticle transformation, a relativistic modification on the stationary Schrodinger equation for many-particle system is made. The eigenvalue in the center of mass system is no longer equal to the negative of binding energy simply. The possible applications in various fields (e.g. the model of quarkonium) are discussed.
